feed.title: Google Cloud: Model Armor
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Model Armor

entry.content: Model Armor is integrated with Google Agentspace to provide greater insights and enhanced security of your agent interactions by default. For more information, see Integration with Google Agentspace.
entry.summary: Model Armor now integrates with Google Agentspace, offering enhanced security and insights into agent interactions.
entry.title: Feature: Model Armor and Agentspace Integration

entry.content: Model Armor integration with Google Kubernetes Engine is available in General Availability.
entry.summary: Model Armor integration with Google Kubernetes Engine is now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: Model Armor now on GKE

entry.content: The Model Armor monitoring dashboard provides a centralized view to track interactions and violations within your projects. This feature is available in Preview. For more information, see View the monitoring dashboard.
entry.summary: Introducing the Model Armor monitoring dashboard, a new feature providing a centralized view to track interactions and violations within your projects.
entry.title: Feature: Model Armor Monitoring Dashboard

entry.content: Model Armor supports the asia-southeast1 location. For information about supported locations, see Locations for the Model Armor API.
entry.title: Changed: Model Armor supports new location

entry.content: You can use Terraform to manage Model Armor floor settings and templates. This helps reduce manual overhead with Model Armor deployments. For more information, see Terraform resources for Security Command Center.
entry.summary: Manage Model Armor settings with Terraform.
entry.title: Feature: Terraform for Model Armor
